oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Capitalism – Describing an Elite Movement
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: von Boeselager, Franziskus
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Joyce Appleby: The Relentless Revolution: A History of Capitalism, New York/ London: W. W. Norton & Company, 2011.Ivan T. Berend: An Economic History of Nineteenth-Century Europe: Diversity and Industrialization, Cambridge: Cambridge University Press, 2013.Jack Goody: Metals, Culture and Capitalism: An Essay on the Origins of the Modern World, Cambridge: Cambridge University Press, 2012.Jürgen Kocka: Geschichte des Kapitalismus, Munich: C. H. Beck, 2013.Jerry Z. Muller: Capitalism and the Jews, Princeton: Princeton University Press, 2010.
